TopicTitle: The Whackjob Challenge - unofficial Kerbin Cup entry, stock parts

Articles.Content:
Allmhuran.... you are an evil genius.

You shoulda been official for this contest. *Salutes*

I was thinking "Hats off" the entire video. Then I finished it and can't find a way of expressing how many hats I would take off. It's brilliant!!!!!, stock only... my god, so sad it's not an official entry!

^^^^^So true.^^^^^

I would literally steal about 100 credit cards and $2 billion cash, buy every possible hat ever made on Earth, put it on my head, and take them off one by one. Congratulations sir, you are as whackjobby as Whackjob himself, and that's almost impossble.

Allmhuran.... you are an evil genius.

You shoulda been official for this contest. *Salutes*

Too much pressure! But thanks all
